description.value:
Connected to backpack mounted fuel source, can drill holes between 10cm and 1m in diameter, and can bore most materials at a maximum rate of 1m per second. Requires both hands to use, and Strength Bonus of 6+ or gain 1 Fatigue per minute of use. Can be used in combat although as -20 for WS tests and can't multi-attack.

Requirements

Weapon Stats: Melee; 2d10+10 E; Pen 13; Unwieldy. -20 to Melee Attacks, can't multiattack.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
